name: Luper
description:
Luper wished dearly to sleep his summer days away,
dreaming of acorns, cool breezes and tireless play.

It wasn't meant to happen, he was needed by his little world.
In the plans of his enemies, his fate was inadvertently twirled.

Guidance, Friendship, Courage, Resolve and Power,
Are the things we need to overcome this dark hour.
